infos.value: Ngh...
Hey, are you all right?
I told you that you needn't fight to figure it out...
I admit my defeat... Do as you wish.
You heard the lady.
Then shall we leave her here?
Leave me here...? Just like that?
Apologies, but we're in a bit of a hurry.
He's right! Lady Machérie gave us an important message to deliver.
Machérie!? The princess of Hourne?
Oh, do you know her?
I do. In truth...
...So Hourne has succumbed to infighting.
This might bode well for Leonis.
You're right about that.
If we can inform King Robb of the situation, we could end the war!
Well, then...
Why don't you come with us?
We should get a move on—for Ovis's sake as well.
...Thank you.
By the way, where exactly is Ovis?
You don't know?
It lies northwest of here.
Now that Ovis has fallen, Rundall will likely continue its conquest eastward.
Damn them... Of all the nerve!
We should get going. Once we get to Wezette, we'll track down King Robb and Lord Mont!
